name: Presentations Slide Show
summary: Learn about .PRSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PRSX files are saved in a proprietary format and are similar to .PPSX files saved by Microsoft PowerPoint. They are designed for storing a completed slide show and when they are double-clicked, the slide show begins full screen on the user's computer. PRSX files are also useful for sending finished presentations to other Presentations users.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
